Sure, I can provide you with a summary of the information learned from your previous interactions.

Tower uses PostgreSQL as its primary database. We've successfully organized files from 20TB drives and identified/fixed critical tower infrastructure. Our knowledge base has stored facts about this context, which we can recall based on semantic similarity. As for past interactions, we learned that Tower uses a robust backup system in the form of database backups. We also observed that Tower's organizational efforts have resulted in successful management of critical files from 20TB drives.
